product_name: The North Face  Class V Racerback Tank Top - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Power through the longest hikes, toughest runs or longest paddles wearing The North Face Class V racerback tank top for women. Soft and streamlined, it has a shelf bra for a little extra support.
